description:
After submitting a patch, I got a lot of similar errors in tempest.

http://logs.openstack.org/52/74552/2/check/check-tempest-dsvm-full/8841b27/console.html

title: exceptions.ServerFault is raised when creating a server

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xu-haiwei

comments.content:
logstash shows this happening a lot, about 7/8 of the time in a cells ( non-voting) run. I searched for

"The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500)" as the message.

Don't see how this could be related to tempest.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~david-kranz

comments.content: please attach the nova logs for more information here
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tjones-i

comments.content:
Another example here:

http://logs.openstack.org/81/67281/25/check/check-tempest-dsvm-neutron-full/c47cda8/console.html

It's very frequent in the neutron full job:

http://logstash.openstack.org/#
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rossella-o

comments.content:
Actually this is better query
http://logstash.openstack.org/#

The previous one is actually selecting also the ClientException...which doesn't seem related and for which I opened a bug here:
https://bugs.launchpad.net/neutron/+bug/1291918
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rossella-o

comments.content: This appears to have the same root cause as bug 1283522.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~salvatore-orlando

comments.content: Marking as 'Fix committed' for neutron per Salvatore's comment.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~enikanorov
